alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 02 at 7:44PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Mermentau River Near Mermentau ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Sabine River Near Deweyville ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Texas... Pine Island Bayou Near Sour Lake Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River near White Oak Park. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 2.0 feet, Minor flooding of Goos Ferry Road will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:50 PM CST Monday the stage was 2.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:50 PM CST Monday was 2.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to 2.1 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then rise to 2.2 feet Wednesday evening. It will fall to flood stage early Thursday afternoon. It will then rise to 2.1 feet Thursday evening. It will fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 2.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Calcasieu River White Oak Park 2.0 2.1 Mon 6 pm CST 2.2 2.2 2.1 &&
